summary:
After about 10 years working between Paris and Amsterdam as a photo and video producer specialized in advertisement, fashion and music, what I offer now to my clients are my strong organisation skills in the addition to a strong creative network. My aim is to give new impulsions to brands and to work on real (love)stories...

As well as producing for my own clients, I also work for and with advertisement agencies, production companies and independent photographers and directors.

I can handle a complete production from art buying to casting, location scouting, accommodation, equipment rental, make-up and styling to post production and accountancy.
Also, sustainability for me is a key and I try every step of my projects to be as eco-responsable as possible.

Feel free to send me an email to talk about your project or to meet for a cup of coffee!

- www.sonjajuillet.com -

• NIKE • ADIDAS • ASICS • TOMMY HILFIGER • H&M • NETFLIX • APPLE / FNAC • MARVEL • CITROËN • LEE COOPER • MICROSOFT • SNCF & more!
